Articles.Content:
Hey guys .

Just wondering as you are in deep space all you see is you're ship & it's backdrop - i know there may be a few backdrops to install as mods to change it out can some 1 pls link me or even show me how nice these can be .

As im not a fan of the existing 1 ,just something new too look @ Kind Regards loony979 ...

These two will do it:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44135-0-22-Universe-Replacer-v4-0

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-22-TextureReplacer-0-8-%2811-Dec%29
